articles.title: Lionel Messi's World Cup winning photo overtakes Bella Poarch as most liked social media post - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Argentine superstar has surpassed the record which had been set by a TikTok video set by Filipino-born American singer and social media personality Bella Poarch back in 2020.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi's Instagram post celebrating Argentina's World Cup triumph is now officially the most liked social media post of all time.

articles.title: Argentina's Emiliano Martinez has five acts of shoot-out skullduggery - Daily Mail
